title: Add JobPosting JSON-LD structured data to CareersPage

requirements.text: In frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx, inject a valid schema.org JobPosting JSON-LD structured data block directly in the component's JSX return as a <script type='application/ld+json'> tag using dangerouslySetInnerHTML. The JSON-LD must include at minimum: @context (https://schema.org), @type (JobPosting), title (Class A CDL Team Driver – OTR Refrigerated), hiringOrganization (Supreme Trucking / supremeltl.com), jobLocation (nationwide/United States), datePosted, baseSalary reflecting the CPM pay structure, and applicationContact with phone (201) 838-0000 ext. 1 and email recruiting@supremeltl.com. Do not modify any other component, page, backend logic, or styling — only add the <script> tag to CareersPage.tsx.

quotes: i need you to add JobPosting schema to the careers page. change nothing else

acceptanceCriteria: The rendered DOM of the /careers route contains a <script type='application/ld+json'> element.
The JSON-LD content parses as valid JSON and includes @context, @type, title, hiringOrganization, jobLocation, and datePosted fields.
No other component, page, backend file, or stylesheet is modified.

constraints: Do not alter any existing visible content, layout, or styling on the Careers page.
Do not modify any backend files, other frontend components, or other pages.
nonGoals: Changing any copy, pay rates, contact info, or visual design on the Careers page.
Adding structured data to any page other than CareersPage.tsx.
Modifying Header.tsx, Footer.tsx, or any other component.
